notes.text:
This update for cpio fixes the following issues:

- A regression in the previous update could lead to crashes (bsc#1189465)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: GNU cpio through 2.13 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted pattern file, because of a dstring.c ds_fgetstr integer overflow that triggers an out-of-bounds heap write. NOTE: it is unclear whether there are common cases where the pattern file, associated with the -E option, is untrusted data.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
